mapper.select: SELECT c."coursecode" as courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."category" AS category, c."professorid" AS professorId FROM public."course" c WHERE c."coursecode"=#{courseCode}
SELECT c."coursecode" as courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."category" AS category FROM public."course" c WHERE c."coursename"=#{courseName}

SELECT c."coursecode" as courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."category" AS category, p."firstname" as prof_firstname, p."lastname" as prof_lastname, p."userid" as prof_professorid FROM public."course" c INNER JOIN professor p ON p.userid = c.professorId

SELECT c."coursecode" as courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."category" AS category, p."firstname" as prof_firstname, p."lastname" as prof_lastname, p."userid" as prof_professorid FROM public."course" c INNER JOIN professor p ON p.userid = c.professorId INNER JOIN enrollment e ON c.coursecode = e.coursecode INNER JOIN student s ON e.studentid = s.userid WHERE s."userid" = #{studentId}

SELECT c."coursecode" AS courseCode, c."coursename" AS courseName, c."starttime" AS startTime, c."endtime" AS endTime, p."firstname" as prof_firstname, p."lastname" as prof_lastname, p."userid" as prof_professorid FROM public."course" c INNER JOIN professor p ON p.userid = c.professorId INNER JOIN enrollment e ON c.coursecode = e.coursecode INNER JOIN student s ON e.studentid = s.userid WHERE s."userid" = #{studentId}
